author: ate
msg: Ignore running demo fusion hsql database lock file.

author: bojan
msg: Correct detection of various databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite2/3, Oracle).
Use mysql_config to help detect required CPPFLAGS/LDFLAGS for MySQL.

author: ate
msg: JS2-190: Implementation of a background monitor for PortletApplication descriptor changes.

author: ate
msg: No need to log *and* throw exceptions when the receiver of the exception already will log itself too.

author: ate
msg: Reduce the unwielding number of FragmentPortletDefinition instances created for each and every access to PortletEntity.getPortletDefinition().
Now, a ThreadLocal will properly cache one instance per request.
